node.title: Death toll from Houston concert crush rises to 10 with death of child
node.alt: A young African American boy shows two fingers as he poses in front of a theme park with people behind
node.description: Ezra Blount, a nine-year-old trampled at a concert in Houston earlier this month and placed on life support, has died, announces his family's lawyer, while planning a $1.36 million lawsuit.
node.content:
["A nine-year-old boy who\u00a0was trampled at a concert in Houston earlier this month and placed on life support has died, his family's lawyer has announced.", "The death of Ezra Blount brought the total number of those killed during the Astroworld Festival to 10, ranging in ages from nine to 27 years-old.", "The\u00a0deaths took place when Grammy award-nominated rapper Travis Scott appeared before a crowd of 50,000 at NRG Stadium.", "The scene grew out of control as fans surged toward the stage as the performance continued.", "\"The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,\" said lawyer Ben Crump.", "", "
Treston Blount (left) carried his son Ezra on his shoulders when they were crushed by the Astroworld crowd.(Courtesy of Taylor Blount via AP)
", "Treston Blount, Ezra's father, described what happened on November 5 in a post on a GoFundMe page that he set up to help cover\u00a0Ezra's medical expenses.", "He said Ezra was sitting on his shoulders when a crowd surge crushed them.", "The father lost consciousness and when he came to, Ezra was missing, Mr Blount said.", "A frantic search ensued until Ezra was eventually found at the hospital, severely injured.", "", "
A surge in the packed crowd came as rapper Travis Scott performed at Astroworld.(/Houston Chronicle via AP:\u00a0Jamaal Ellis)
", "The child incurred severe damage to his brain, kidney\u00a0and liver after being \"kicked, stepped on, and trampled, and nearly crushed to death,\" according to a lawsuit his family has filed against Scott and the event's organiser, Live Nation.", "The Blount family is seeking at least $1 million ($1.36 million) in damages.", "
Deaths 'could have been prevented'
", "Mr Crump has said that any one of several concert officials could have prevented deaths and injuries by stopping the show and turning on the house lights when the chaos in the crowd became apparent.", "He and other lawyers\u00a0for those hurt at the festival have filed more than 90\u00a0lawsuits\u00a0against Scott and the organisers.", "", "
Memorials and funerals have begun for the 10 Astroworld victims.(AP:\u00a0Robert Bumsted)
", "They are alleging negligence in crowd control, failure to provide proper medical attention and a lack of emergency preparations, among other issues.", "Last week, Scott\u00a0asked victims and their families to reach out to him, saying he \"desperately wishes to share his condolences and provide aid,\" according to a statement.", "The rapper earlier offered to pay for funeral costs and mental health counselling.", "Wires/ABC"]
